# B站搜索页美化
[![GitHub license](https://img.shields.io/github/license/Trrrrw/UserScript?style=flat-square&color=4285dd&logo=github)](https://github.com/Trrrrw/UserScript)

[![](https://img.shields.io/static/v1?label=%20&message=GreasyFork&style=flat-square&labelColor=7B0000&color=960000&logo=data:image/png;base64,)](https://greasyfork.org/zh-CN/users/1016978-trrrrw)

---

## 功能：
优化`https://search.bilibili.com/all`页面，最终效果：
![bili-search-preview](https://cdn.staticaly.com/gh/Trrrrw/image-hosting@master/images/bili-search-preview.webp)
背景图片是bgimg，修改其链接即可修改背景图片。

---

## 适配网站：
|网站链接|PC|Phone|
|-|-|-|
|search.bilibili.com/all|✔️|✖️|
